query1: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Department is "cpsc"; show Department and ID; sort in ascending order by ID.
query2: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Audit is equal to 2; show Audit and ID.
query3: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Audit is equal to 2 and Department is "math"; show Audit and ID and Title.
query4: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Audit is equal to 2 or Department is "math"; show Audit and ID and Title; sort in ascending order by Fail.
query5: In courses dataset courses, find entries whose Audit is not greater than 10 and Department is not "math" and Average is not less than 76; show Audit and ID and Title.
query7: In courses dataset courses grouped by ID, find entries whose ID is 400; show Average and ID and Instructor and Title and avg, where avg is the AVG of Average; sort in descending order by ID.
query8: In rooms dataset rooms grouped by Latitude and Short Name, find all entries; show Longitude and Short Name and fgdfg, where fgdfg is the COUNT of Address; sort in ascending order by Full Name.
